controller

Class MainController

  • java.lang.Object
    • controller.MainController

  • public class MainController
extends java.lang.Object
    MainController class controls the MainView. Handles events fired in the MainView by users such as selecting stocks, changing time lines and graphing moving averages. Updates information inside JavaFX nodes according to Stock objects, which are contained as attributes inside the class.

    • Method Detail

      • initialize

        private void initialize()
        Called when MainView is instantiated. Modifies the chart's attributes, initializes buttons, and sets styles. Graphs DOW Jones 30 closing prices as a default stock.

      • timelineSelected

        private void timelineSelected(javafx.event.ActionEvent event)
        Calls the time line graphing method if a stock has been selected.

      • movingAverageSelected

        private void movingAverageSelected(javafx.event.ActionEvent event)
        Ensures the drop down lists of moving averages do not contain duplicates.
        Parameters:
        event - - fired when user selects any moving averages from drop downs

      • updateRecentlyViewedStocksView

        private void updateRecentlyViewedStocksView()
        TODO - Add javadoc comments here

      • resetMovingAverageDropdowns

        private void resetMovingAverageDropdowns()
        Resets moving average drop down items to default.

      • resetMovingAverageDropdownsSelection

        private void resetMovingAverageDropdownsSelection()
        Resets selection of both drop downs.

      • selectStock

        private void selectStock(javafx.event.ActionEvent event)
        Allows the user to select new stock to graph its closing price.
        Parameters:
        event - - fired when the user selects a stock

      • logout

        private void logout(javafx.event.ActionEvent event)
        Saves the User's recentlyViewedStocks to a file, then logs out the User, and navigates to the Login Page.
        Parameters:
        event - - fired when the User clicks the Logout button

      • persistRecentlyViewedStocks

        public static void persistRecentlyViewedStocks()
        Saves the User's recentlyViewedStocks to a file. If the recentlyViewedStocks queue is empty, it does nothing.

      • graphClosingPrices

        private void graphClosingPrices()
        Adds closing prices of currently selected stock according to currently selected time interval. Updates graph information.

      • graphMovingAverage

        private void graphMovingAverage(javafx.event.ActionEvent event)
        Adds one or 2 moving averages to the graph. Also adds indicators where there are intersections.
        Parameters:
        event - - fired when user presses graph button

      • graphIntersections

        private void graphIntersections(javafx.scene.chart.XYChart.Series<java.lang.String,java.lang.Number> tempIntersectionsSeries)
        Adds all recommendations of 2 moving averages to the graph. Green means buy, red means sell.
        Parameters:
        tempIntersectionsSeries - - series containing all intersections in the graph

      • resetIntersections

        private void resetIntersections()
        Removes all intersection indicators from the graph.

      • generateSeries

        private void generateSeries()
        Generates the series for the first selected stock. Series remain the same for all selected stocks afterwards.

      • initializeButtons

        private void initializeButtons()
        Adds all buttons to their respective arrays. Also adds timelines to their respective arrays.

      • clearData

        private void clearData()
        Clears all data from graph for new stock or timeline

      • navigateToLogin

        private void navigateToLogin(javafx.event.ActionEvent event)
        Navigates the User back to the Login Page.
        Parameters:
        event - - passed from the logout method
